ratings.comment: Easily the best TA I have had at Madison. Very knowledgeable and welcoming. You can tell that he is very passionate about the subject matters, and this shows in the way he leads discussion sections. I cannot recommend him enough!

Kevin may be the best TA I've ever had in school. He knows the subject matter and is very knowledgeable, but this isn't what makes him so great. By sitting in his class, you can tell that he genuinely cares about each student. No matter how I feel, I know when I step into his classroom that he will put a smile on my face. Take any class he teaches!
Super nice, passionate and caring! Loved having him as a TA!

Kevin is one of the most enthusiastic TA's I've ever had. He didn't just want to make sure we knew the content, he wanted us to enjoy it. He's very personable and makes everyone feel welcome during discussions. If your taking a class with him as a TA option I promise he's the best option
Kevin is a great TA, very passionate about the subject and always makes the topic very engaging/interesting and gets all students involved in the discussion.

I absolutely love Kevin. He is such a passionate TA. He is one of the best TAs I've had so far. He really cares for his students and loves to hear students talk about their ideas. If you take a class with him then you are one lucky person. KEVIN IS THE BEST!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Kevin is a very passionate TA. He can ramble on, but he really cares for his students and takes interest in the subject material he is teaching. I would highly recommend him.

Kevin is an awesome teacher who really wants you to enjoy and get involved in the class. Make sure you check the syllabus for homework because you will be responsible for it, but overall a great teacher who is flexible and understanding and cares about his students. Kevin is a great teacher as well as a great person.

Kevin is a great teacher. Very enthusiastic, very laid back. Hilarious. Interesting language and culture. He loves to see his students get involved and always makes sure everyone is contributing. Would highly recommend!
